speaker_1.speaker: lyra
speaker_1.text: Captain, may I speak with you? Those ruins... there was something wrong about them. The Light felt distant there.

speaker_2.speaker: lyra
speaker_2.text: I've heard whispers in Ironmark about dark forces stirring. The undead we faced today were just the beginning.

choice_1.text: Dark forces or not, we deal with threats as they come. That's our job.

choice_2.text: Tell me more. If something threatens the region, we should know about it.

choice_3.text: Can your faith protect us from such things?

speaker_3a.speaker: lyra
speaker_3a.text: I understand pragmatism, Captain. But some threats require more than steel to defeat.

speaker_3b.speaker: lyra
speaker_3b.text: There's a necromancer. I don't know who, but someone is raising the dead. The church has been investigating.

speaker_3c.speaker: lyra
speaker_3c.text: The Light protects those who walk in its grace. As long as I stand with this company, you have its blessing.

speaker_4.speaker: lyra
speaker_4.text: I'll pray for guidance tonight. May the Light illuminate our path forward.

speaker_4b.speaker: lyra
speaker_4b.text: I'm glad you're willing to listen, Captain. When I learn more, you'll be the first to know.
